Description: String unique identifier for a study variable
Foreign key and string unique identifier of the concept used for defining the study variable
Boolean value defining whether the variable is an exposure variable or not
Boolean value defining whether the variable is an outcome variable or not
Boolean value defining whether the variable is a covariable or not
Data type of the variable when used as study variable
Integer defining the start of look back window prior to index date
Integer defining the end of look back window prior to index date
String with the function name used for anchoring
Text used as the description of the variable
Foreign key to the study variables ID and string unique identifier of the composite study variable
Foreign key to the study variables ID,  defines which study variables are combined
String defining which combination logic rule is used for combining the subvariables - this can be OR, AND, and AND NOT
